job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Management Consulting
job.description:
Company Description
Proximate Technologies Inc
is in staffing and consulting since 2004, we are immensely successful in creating a global network of highly adopt intelligent workforce that can help you achieve critical projects and goals. Keeping pace with projects and being on the lookout for the extremely talented individuals has become even more challenging and here is where Proximate comes in to play!
We have been providing top consulting services and we are one of the fastest growing IT Consulting Firm in this complex job market with cutting-edge technologies in project implementing services and client recruitment capabilities. Our vision is to support services needs of our clients and offer them technology-driven business solutions that meet their goals and corporate objectives.
Job Description
Design and analyze experiments to verify product hypothesis and direction
Audit quality of launch experiment results and guarantee correct measurement of product or technical changes' impact
Keep track of core metrics and attribute metrics changes to root causes
Analyze market dynamics, potential gain and cost of new product initiatives, and consult on product strategy
Use data and experiment to verify hypothesis around bottlenecks in product growth, and consult on direction for improvement
Work with engineers and product stakeholders to deliver product insights.
Qualifications
Master degree in Computer Science , Electrical Engineering and Information Technology
Expertise in SQL and programming in Python or R
Knowledge in basic machine learning and deep learning
Strong communication and teamwork skills
Additional Information
All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
